name: 35th APACRS Annual Meeting_NEXUS - Connecting Everyone & Everything
content: The APACRS annual meeting features a carefully curated scientific program, tailored and relevant to doctors in the Asia-Pacific. Highlights of the scientific program cover the most relevant and focused MasterClasses covering the hottest topics in ophthalmic surgery today, Film Festival, Top Gun - Top Cataract Surgery Tips and features the Combined Symposium of Cataract and Refractive Societies (CSCRS). Held in different countries in the Asia-Pacific region, the APACRS annual meeting has become the most important regional meeting for cataract and refractive surgery and one of the most important educational events in the global ophthalmological calendar.
organizers: Asia-Pacific Association of Cataract & Refractive Surgeons (APACRS)
